KeepawayConfig.Description: There are 5 variants of methods to adapt the evolutionary search : 1. Objective-Based Search - uses average hold time in secs over 30 episodes 2. Novelty Search - uses behavioral diversity , measured on 3 behavior characterising properties - average number of passes, average dispersion of team members and average distance of ball from center of field of play 3. NS-Hybrid (Novelty + Objective-Based) Search 4. Genotypic Diversity maintanance Search - It uses compatibility distance measure 5. GD-Hybrid (Genotypic Diversity + Objective-Based) Search RealFitness is the average hold time defined per genome (over 30 episodes , i.e 30 trials)
